posts.post_content:
I played this a couple of nights ago and my friends just started laughing... clearly not destined for the Hall of Fame.

1/5

Posted By: Omnei_of_Bant (10/15/2010 8:23:16 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: [Infantry Veteran](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Infantry Veteran) costs ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol) less but cannot give it's bonus to blockers. This guy can give his bonus to both attackers and blockers because nobody plays with snowcovered lands these days. So why is IV 2.5 and this 0,7? Don't say it's because you are too afraid of this guy dying.
posts.html:
Infantry Veteran costs less but cannot give it's bonus to blockers. This guy can give his bonus to both attackers and blockers because nobody plays with snowcovered lands these days. So why is IV 2.5 and this 0,7? Don't say it's because you are too afraid of this guy dying.

posts.post_content: I like that flavorwise, this guy is a smaller, weaker version of [Kjeldoran Elite Guard](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kjeldoran Elite Guard). There are tons of human soldiers that are better at 2 mana.
